sentences.english: Instead, they watch pirated DVDs or surf the Web.
sentences.chinese: 取而代之，他们看盗版光碟或者在网上冲浪。

sentences.english: Do you really want to erase the current disc?
sentences.chinese: 您确定要抹除目前的光碟？

sentences.english: The report in CD-ROM format is now available for sale at the online Government Bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 年报以光碟出版，现已在网上政府书店有售。

sentences.english: The model can then be used to augment the design of running optimal power control in rewritable optical disc system.
sentences.chinese: 此模式可提供光碟写入时动态功率控制的依据。

sentences.english: Appending new files to a multisession disc is not advised.
sentences.chinese: 不建议在多重区段的光碟中加入新的档案。

sentences.english: The CD changer integrated in the glove box compartment holds up to six discs at a time.
sentences.chinese: 手套盒内的CD换碟机能够同时容纳六张光碟。

sentences.english: Built-in CD ripper can rip your CDs in most popular audio formats.
sentences.chinese: 以撕裂你的光碟中最流行的音频格式。

sentences.english: Hi, every time I download a MAME rom it automatically unzips ?
sentences.chinese: 您好，我每次下载一个马姆光碟它会自动解压？

sentences.english: A data integrity test will begin as soon as the disc is inserted.
sentences.chinese: 资料完整性检查会在插入光碟后尽快开始。

sentences.english: Burn to CD or DVD, spanning multiple discs if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 烧录到CD或DVD，跨越多张光碟，如果必要的。

sentences.english: This file contains the checksums of the files located on the CD-ROM.
sentences.chinese: 这个档案包含了光碟上所有档案的检错码。

sentences.english: Would you like a VCD of Japanese cartoons , too? Yes , please .
sentences.chinese: 你也想要一张日本卡通片的光碟吗？是的，我想要。

sentences.english: The set of discs fathoms the exercise of wrist routine in interlinked hand skills.
sentences.chinese: 本套光碟讲解手串子中的腕套。

sentences.english: You had better return the VCD by ten in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 你最好在晚间十点钟之前归还VCD光碟。

sentences.english: In order to access your CD-ROM drive, please enter the device file that should be used.
sentences.chinese: 为了能够存取您的光碟机，请输入其所对应的装置档。

sentences.english: Inception is now available on Blu-ray and DVD.
sentences.chinese: 《盗梦空间》的蓝光光碟和DVD碟都已经面世。

definition: compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]
Blu-ray disk, Sony high definition DVD disk
